00039 namespace experimental

00042 template<typename Incrementable,
00043          typename CategoryOrTraversal = use_default,
00044          typename Difference = use_default>
00045   class counting_iterator
00046     : public detail::counting_iterator_base<Incrementable, CategoryOrTraversal, Difference>::type
00047 {
00048     typedef typename detail::counting_iterator_base<Incrementable, CategoryOrTraversal, Difference>::type super_t;
00049 
00050     friend class iterator_core_access;
00051 
00052   public:
00053     typedef Incrementable const & reference;
00054     typedef typename super_t::difference_type difference_type;
00055 
00056     __host__ __device__
00057     counting_iterator(void){};
00058 
00059     // XXX nvcc can't compile this at the moment
00060     //__host__ __device__
00061     //counting_iterator(counting_iterator const &rhs):super_t(rhs.base()){}
00062 
00063     __host__ __device__
00064     explicit counting_iterator(Incrementable x):super_t(x){}
00065 
00066   private:
00067     __host__ __device__
00068     reference dereference(void) const
00069     {
00070       return this->base_reference();
00071     }
00072 
00073     // XXX enable distance to related counting_iterators later
00074     //template <class OtherIncrementable>
00075     //difference_type
00076     //distance_to(counting_iterator<OtherIncrementable, CategoryOrTraversal, Difference> const& y) const
00077     //{
00078     //  typedef typename mpl::if_<
00079     //      detail::is_numeric<Incrementable>
00080     //    , detail::number_distance<difference_type, Incrementable, OtherIncrementable>
00081     //    , detail::iterator_distance<difference_type, Incrementable, OtherIncrementable>
00082     //  >::type d;
00083 
00084     //  return d::distance(this->base(), y.base());
00085     //}
00086 }; // end counting_iterator
00087 
00088 template <typename Incrementable>
00089 inline counting_iterator<Incrementable>
00090 make_counting_iterator(Incrementable x)
00091 {
00092   return counting_iterator<Incrementable>(x);
00093 }
00094 
00095 } // end experimental

00097 namespace detail
00098 {
00099 
00100 template<typename Incrementable, typename CategoryOrTraversal, typename Difference>
00101   struct make_device_dereferenceable< thrust::experimental::counting_iterator<Incrementable,CategoryOrTraversal,Difference> >
00102 {
00103   __host__ __device__
00104   static
00105   thrust::experimental::counting_iterator<Incrementable,CategoryOrTraversal,Difference> &
00106   transform(thrust::experimental::counting_iterator<Incrementable,CategoryOrTraversal,Difference> &x)
00107   {
00108     return x;
00109   } // end transform()
00110 
00111   __host__ __device__
00112   static
00113   const thrust::experimental::counting_iterator<Incrementable,CategoryOrTraversal,Difference> &
00114   transform(const thrust::experimental::counting_iterator<Incrementable,CategoryOrTraversal,Difference> &x)
00115   {
00116     return x;
00117   } // end transform()
00118 }; // end make_device_dereferenceable
